Related Character(s): 女, 寧
Связанный символ (и): женщина, нин

嬣字的基本解释

嬣
níng
弱。
女子姿态舒缓。

嬣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［níng］
［《廣韻》女耕切，平耕，娘。］
［《集韻》囊丁切，平青，泥。］
(1)女劣貌。
(2)女子体态舒缓。
(3)同“儜”。弱。
(4)女子名用字。

嬣字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬣； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页272第26
【廣韻】女耕切【集韻】尼耕切，?音儜。體也。姘嬣，女劣貌。一曰女態舒徐也。　又【集韻】囊丁切，音寧。女字。

嬣字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嬣字的起名意思

女子姿态舒缓。

嬣
Basic explanation of words
嬣
níng
weak.
The woman's posture is soothing.
嬣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［níng］
["Guangyun" female ploughing cut, flat ploughing, mother. ]
["Jiyun" capsule cut, flat green, mud. ]
(1) Female inferior appearance.
(2) Women's posture is soothing.
(3) Same as "儜". weak.
(4) Words used in women's names.
嬣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬣; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 272 26
[Guang Yun] Female Gengqie [Jiyun] Ni Gengqie,? The sound is 儜. Body also. Hunk, female inferior appearance. One said that the feminine state is also comfortable.　[Jiyun] The capsule is cut, Yinning. Female characters.
